name: Utilx
tagline: A bunch of feature bundled into a WPF app.
body: # UtilX A bunch of feature bundled into a WPF application. ![WidgetImage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Raathigesh/UtilX/master/Wiki/Images/Gadget.PNG) ###Following Features are supported for now - Flat and Simple CPU and RAM gadget - Explorer Limiter - Helps to keep the amount of open explorer windows in control by closing the older once automatically. - Features can be turned on/off. - Got an idea ? Let's talk! ###Future Plans - Refactor with [ReactiveUI](http://reactiveui.net/) - Theming Support for CPU/RAM gadget - If something useful and cool comes up, it will most probably land here as a feature
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
